attributes.title: Highly offended and disgusted
attributes.review: This app is a scam. none of my guaranteed promises were met and not to mention the app asked for all my personal info which led to my identity being stolen. THIS APP STOLE MY IDENTITY. it took a process of six months to get all or privacy regained. and there was a jump scare when i first opened the app which caused me to throw my phone which is now broken. i do not recommend. just awful

I then heard my doorbell ring  and it was Cheeto himself, he punched me in the face and yelled a series of slurs at me. attributes.title: it gave me chronic illness
attributes.review: first of all, the app is an absolute disappointment. i downloaded it to support the great Cheeto lookin racist president and what do i get. A lousy app that gave me illness....mental illness that is. trump 2020 is all i get when i open the app. It has many errors like the spread of false information and the idolization of a horrific US leader. iâ€™m just concerned for others in the community. i donâ€™t want the mental illness to spread

attributes.title: DO NOT GET THIS APP

Secondly the app promotes making this country â€œgreat againâ€ but i believe thatâ€™s false advertisement seeing that The USA was never great in the first place. Donâ€™t download this app i hope apple deletes this app itâ€™s a literal waste of space.

attributes.title: Worst app ever

On the occasion that it actually opens, it tries to tell me about how superior i am for being a white man, stroking my ego until i actually believe every word that comes out of the presidentâ€™s bug ridden mouth.
